overview: Luis A. Ortiz is a lifelong dreamer, http://www.syfyvideo.com is Luis latest journey. He decided to create a company to show case all the amazing videos that live in cyberspace. http://www.syfyvideo.com is a human aggregation system, instated having a program look for videos on the web. http://www.syfyvideo.com add video via humans, a program doesn’t know if a video is cool. http://www.syfyvideo.com don’t want it user to waste their time by watching stupid and retarded videos.
